resources.string: To play you have to enable Location permission. If your are concerned about your data privacy, please read our privacy policies on our website.
Error while trying connecting, please verify your email and your password
Well done! You are now connected
Warning! You are not connected. To play you have first to set up an account.
There is a problem with the connection. Please verify if your device is connected. It\'s also possible that our service is turned off, go on our website to check our News Feed
Sorry but your application is not up to date. Please Update !
Please enable your location Provider on your smartphone !
Error, you have already claim today\'s gps location !
"You have not reached today's location. Distance to destination: "
Sorry but your phone has not been able to establish a connection with a gps satellite. Please wait while it tries again
You have to reach this location !
